title: sqldef Test Case Schema
description: Schema for sqldef YAML test files that define schema migration test cases

TestCase.description: A single test case for schema migration testing

current.description: The current schema state (SQL DDL statements). Defaults to empty schema if omitted.

desired.description: The desired schema state (SQL DDL statements). Defaults to empty schema if omitted.

up.description: Expected DDL output for migrating from current to desired schema (current → desired). If specified, 'down' must also be specified.

down.description: Expected DDL output for migrating from desired to current schema (desired → current). Required if 'up' is specified.

error.description: Expected error message. If specified, the test expects this error to occur.

min_version.description: Minimum database version required to run this test (e.g., "10.0")

max_version.description: Maximum database version supported for this test (e.g., "14.0")

user.description: Database user to run the test as

flavor.description: Database flavor requirement. Use '!' prefix to exclude a flavor (e.g., '!tidb' to skip on TiDB). MySQL flavors: mysql, mariadb, tidb. PostgreSQL flavors: pgvector.

managed_roles.description: Roles whose privileges are managed by sqldef for privilege testing

enable_drop.description: Whether to enable DROP/REVOKE operations. Defaults to true.

legacy_ignore_quotes.description: Quote handling mode. true (default) = always quote identifiers, false = quote only when source is quoted

offline.description: Use offline testing only (no database connection). Use for proprietary SQL dialects like Aurora DSQL.

config.description: Optional configuration settings for the test
